title: School of Medicine Continuing Professional Development
description: Course syllabus for Pediatric GI for Primary Care
cleaned_text: Pediatric GI for Primary Care Course Syllabus To view the presentation slides click on the talk title to open the handout for that talk. The syllabus will be available for approximately six months following the activity For optimal viewing of the pdf files, download [Adobe Acrobat Reader](https://get.adobe.com/reader/). Friday, November 13 [Pediatric Abdominal Pain](https://www.ohsu.edu/sites/default/files/2020-11/Peds_GI_2020_Lee.pdf) Amanda M.S.N., F.N.P. of [Pediatric Gastrointestinal Liver Enzymes](https://www.ohsu.edu/sites/default/files/2020-11/Peds_GI_2020_Doan.pdf) Sylvia Doan, M.D.
